item.title: Trump links pain reliever Tylenol to autism - but many experts are sceptical
item.description: Some studies have suggested an association between the two, but experts say there is no causal relationship.

item.title: France formally recognises Palestinian state
item.description: Speaking at the UN in New York, President Emmanuel Macron said "the time for peace has come".

item.title: Copenhagen Airport shut after drone sightings
item.description: Take-offs and landings at the airport have been suspended since around 20:30 local time (19:30 BST).

item.title: ICC charges Rodrigo Duterte with crimes against humanity
item.description: The former president of the Philippines is accused of being involved in the deaths of dozens of people.

item.title: Footage shows public executions in Gaza City street
item.description: Hamas-linked social media channels say "three collaborators who were spying for the occupation" were executed.
